email.subject: NPTEL Newsletter: New Courses Available
email.body:
Dear Learner,

Explore newly launched courses from IITs.

Visit: https://nptel.ac.in

--
To unsubscribe, email newsletter-announce+unsubscribe@nptel.iitm.ac.in

email.subject: Project Review Meeting
email.body:
Hi Abinaya,

Can we schedule the project review meeting for Friday at 3 PM?

Please confirm.

Regards,
Guide

ideal_response:
Hello Sir,

Yes, Friday at 3 PM works for me. I will be available for the project review meeting.

Regards,
Abinaya

email.subject: Semester Examination Results Published
email.body:
Dear Student,

Your semester examination results have been published.

Login to the student portal to view details.

Regards,
Examination Cell

email.subject: Limited Time Offer – Up to 70% OFF
email.body:
Hurry!

Big discounts on electronics and fashion.

Shop now: https://amazon.in/deals

--
Unsubscribe | Amazon

email.subject: Approve Budget Proposal
email.body:
Please review the attached budget proposal and let me know if we can proceed.

Thanks,
Manager

ideal_response:
Hello,

I have reviewed the budget proposal and it looks good. You may proceed.

Regards

email.subject: New sign-in detected
email.body:
We detected a new sign-in to your Google Account.

If this was you, no action is required.

Google Security Team

email.subject: Courses starting at ₹499
email.body:
Learn new skills today.

Visit: https://udemy.com

--
Unsubscribe from Udemy promotions

email.subject: Interview Slot Confirmation
email.body:
Please confirm your availability for the interview scheduled tomorrow at 10 AM.

Placement Office

ideal_response:
Hello,

Yes, I am available for the interview tomorrow at 10 AM. Thank you for informing me.

Regards,
Abinaya

email.subject: Book Due Reminder
email.body:
This is a reminder that your borrowed library book is due tomorrow.

Please return it on time.

Library Office

email.subject: Flat 50% off on dining
email.body:
Enjoy discounts at top restaurants near you.

Order now using the app.

--
Manage notifications in Zomato app
